amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to carry out any provision of section 203 of the Voting Rights Act of 1965 which provides for ballot and language assistance to voters.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill to carry out any provision of section 203 of the Voting Rights Act of 1965.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 254 (Roll no. 340).
